# icSerialNumber

**Instance Property**

The IC serial number assigned to the tag by the manufacturer.

## Declaration

```swift
var icSerialNumber: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The IC serial number comes from bits 1 through 48 of the [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO15693Tag/identifier] data and is in big-endian byte order.

## Getting Tag Information

- **icManufacturerCode**: The IC manufacturer code of the tag.
- **identifier**: The unique hardware identifier of the tag.
